update one

Week 15

Due May 06 at 4:30pm #### E11: Design a Hat Add a link to your Figma Slides on your website and submit that link on Canvas. #### P2: Final (Early) Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. This is the early due date. The last day to turn it is December 10 by 11:59pm.

Week 14

Due April 29 at 4:30pm #### P2.8: Checkpoint 8 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas if you want feedback OR submit some text for the checkpoint on Canvas saying you are done.

Week 13

Due April 22 at 4:30pm #### P2.7: Checkpoint 7 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### E11: Design a Hat Bring tools and materials to make your prototype. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a log in page on desktop

Week 12

Due April 15 at 4:30pm #### P2.6: Checkpoint 6 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of an about page on mobile

Week 11

Due April 08 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 10: Halloween Drawing Post a link to your page file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### P2.5: Checkpoint 5 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a well designed footer

Week 10

Due April 01 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 9: 5 Usability Heuristics Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### P2: Checkpoint 4 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of an inventory page for an online store

Week 9

Due March 25 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 8: Not So Usable Post a link to your Figma prototype on your class website and submit a link to it on Canvas. #### P2: Checkpoint 3 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot A well designed featured item(s) section from a website.

Week 8

Due March 18 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 7: Reverse Wireframes Post a link to your Figma prototype on your class website and submit a link to it on Canvas. #### P2: Checkpoint 2 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Two screenshots, one of a well designed homepage above the scroll on desktop and on mobile. Same site for each screenshot.

Week 7

Due March 11 at 4:30pm #### P1: Final Post a link to your final Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### P2: Checkpoint 1 Make a page on your site for your three companies, brief description of the company, and the product(s) they sell. Submit a link to that page on Canvas. #### Exercise 6: Form Redesign Post a link to your Figma prototype on your class website and submit a link to it on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a page selling an item from an online store.

Week 6

Due March 04 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 5: Make it Responsive Add the exercise to your site and submit a link to it on Canvas. #### P1: Checkpoint 5 Post a link to your figma prototype(s) on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a variety of form elements and/or states. If one screenshot captures a few that works or you can have multiple screenshots.

Week 5

Due February 25 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 4: Landing Page Add the exercise to your site and submit a link to it on Canvas. #### P1: Checkpoint 4 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a mobile navigation hidden behind a button. Take a screenshot of the menu open and closed and post the images on your website.

Week 4

Due February 18 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 3: Hover and Animations in XD Have a new Figma link to the prototype on your class website as Exercise 3 and submit the link on Canvas. #### P1: Checkpoint 3 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a well designed button on your website. Make sure to capture the button in the default state and the hover state.

Week 3

Due February 11 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 2: Linking in Figma Have a new Figma link to the prototype on your class website as Exercise 2 and submit the link on Canvas. #### P1: Checkpoint 2 Post a link to your Figma file on your class website and submit the link on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a well designed navigation on a desktop sized site on your website.

Week 2

Due February 04 at 4:30pm #### Exercise 1: A Little Background Have a link to the Figma file on your class website and submit the link on the Canvas assignment. #### P1: Checkpoint 1 Make a page on your site for your three ideas and brief descriptions. Submit a link to that page on Canvas. #### Weekly Screenshot Screenshot of a well designed photo gallery on your website.

Week 1

Due January 28 at 4:30pm #### Nothing It's the first day of class!
